wikipedia_page.main: Frederick Lloyd Bowley (9 November 1873 – 31 May 1943) was a first-class cricketer who played county cricket for Worcestershire from the 1890s to the 1920s. He also represented the Players against the Gentlemen on four occasions.

response: *Frederick Bowley (cricketer, born 1873) (1873–1943), British cricketer for Worcestershire
*Frederick Bowley (cricketer, born 1909) (1909–1994), British cricketer for Leicestershire
